nl: If signal/bus == level/value and signal/bus == level/value, then signal/bus == level/value in the next cycle.
If signal/bus == level/value and signal/bus == level/value, then $stable(signal/bus) in the next cycle.
If signal/bus == level/value, then signal/bus == level/value.
If signal/bus == level/value, then signal/bus != level/value.
If signal/bus == level/value and signal/bus == level/value, then signal/bus == level/value.
If signal/bus == level/value, then signal/bus == level/value eventually.
